resources.string: A task need to be reviewed
The default title for a tasks
Are you sure you want to delete this event?
select time to remove before tasks

Gtaskdroid is an Android app which helps you to organize your day to day tasks. This app is ready to go after installation. This app allows you to sync your Gtasks with this app and also you can push your task into Gtask. Authentication to Google accounts is taken from “Account and sync” settings on your device. To get the maximum use you must have a Google account.
1. Sync tasks between a multiple Google accounts with a one application.

2. Application view tasks in three categories “Overdue”, “Today” and “Other”. Overdue tasks will be automatically deleted after certain duration which user can specify. Default is after one month. You can change this in settings, Overdue task removing. You can have a preferred task title as default.
3. In “Gtask” menu item is to view your Gtask list. From that list you can specify the required task that need to be synced to the app. You can switch your accounts in Gtask list.

4. If you need to sync a task which is in the application you need to switch the task into Edit view and in there is a menu item called sync; that will sync that particular task to your account. You can change your accounts when you sync.
Allows an application to request authentication tokens.
Allows application to create network sockets and communicate.
Allows application to prevent phone getting into sleep while notifications.
Allows application to Boot up when the device boots. Which requires to maintain reminders.
This is an Open source application and you can access the application repository
